snippet: A teenager who raped and killed his high school math teacher knew right from wrong, a prosecutor said on Monday during closing arguments in a murder trial in Salem.
abstract: Teenager Philip Chism is accused of murdering and raping his math teacher, 24-year-old Colleen Ritzer at Danvers High School; prosecutors argue against claims from the now 16-year-old's lawyers and say he was mentally competent when he committed crimes.
lead_paragraph: A teenager who raped and killed his high school math teacher knew right from wrong, a prosecutor said on Monday during closing arguments in a murder trial in Salem.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Jury Weighs Murder of Teacher
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Jury Weighs Murder of Teacher
